name: *呼びかける
note: <Act Skill>

description: Makes snow balls fall through the screen.
message2: Makes snow balls fall through the screen.
name: Snow
note:
<Use Undertale Attack>

<UTB Duration: 1200>
<UTB Mode: 0>

<UTB Code>
if(f === 2) {
  this.message("Hello! This is message!");
}
</UTB Code>

============================================================

<UTB Initial Code>
this._count = 0;
</UTB Initial Code>

============================================================

(If it has been 50 frames after the last attack spawned, there 
is a 1/75 chance of another one spawning.)

<UTB Code>
if(Math.randomInt(75) === 1 && this._count > 50) {
  this.createAttack(1);
  this._count = 0;
}
this._count++;
</UTB Code>

============================================================

<UTB Attack 1> 
Destructible: true
Initial X: this.window.right
Initial Y: this.window.top
X Speed: 3
Y Speed: 0.5
Radius: 10
Color: white
Spawn Rate: -1
Spawn Delay: 0 
Delete Distance: 1000
<Direct Code> 
if(this.x >= (Graphics.width / 2)) this.xaccel = -0.3;
if(this.x < (Graphics.width / 2)) this.xaccel = 0.3;
if(this.xspeed > 10) this.xspeed = 10;
if(this.xspeed < -10) this.xspeed = -10;
</Direct Code> 
</UTB Attack 1>

description: Rains bullets down which create a maze.
message2: Rains bullets down which create a maze.
name: Random Maze
note:
<Use Undertale Attack>

<UTB Duration: 1300>
<UTB Mode: 0>
<UTB Delete Outside Frame>

============================================================

(Creates Initial Maze)
<UTB Initial Code>
this._a = [];
this._a.push(Math.randomInt(8) + 1);
for(var i = 1; i < 19; i++) {
  var prev = this._a[i-1];
  prev += (Math.randomInt(2) - 1);
  if(prev > 8) prev += (Math.randomInt(2) - 3);
  if(prev < 1) prev += (Math.randomInt(2) + 1);
  this._a.push(prev);
}
</UTB Initial Code>

============================================================

<UTB Code>
for(var j = 0; j < this._a.length; j++) {
if(f === (50 * j)) {
for(var i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
if(i != this._a[j]) {
var temp = this.createAttack(1);
temp.x = this.window.x + ((30 * i) + 15);
}}}}
</UTB Code>

<UTB Attack 1>
Destructible: true
Initial X: 0
Initial Y: this.window.y
X Speed: 0
Y Speed: 1
Radius: 3
Color: #FFFFFF
Spawn Rate: -1
Spawn Delay: 0
</UTB Attack 1>

note:

<UTB Duration: 1100>
<UTB Mode: 4>

<UTB Initial Code>
this._myCount = 0;
</UTB Initial Code>

<UTB Code>
if(f < 80) {
  this.window.x -= 2;
  this.window.width += 4;
} else {
  if(this._myCount == 20) {
    this.createAttack(1);
    this._myCount = 0;
  }
  this._myCount += 1;
}

name: Trap Skill
note:
<Use Undertale Attack>

<UTB Mode: 3>
<UTB Duration: 600>

<UTB Initial Code>
this._powerness = 30;
this._yDirection = 1;
</UTB Initial Code>

<UTB Code>
if(f === 1) {
  if(!$gameMessageBubble.hasSavedText()) {
    this.message("Prepare to die.");
  }
}
if(f <= 90) {
  this.window.x -= 2;
  this._player.x -= 2;
} else {
  this.window.x++;
  this._player.x++;
  this.window.y += this._yDirection;
  if(f % 60 === 0) this._yDirection = -this._yDirection;
}
if(f % this._powerness === 0 && f > 90) {
  var atk = this.createAttack(1);
  var random = Math.randomInt(3);
  if(random === 0) atk.y += 30 + 3;
  else if(random === 1) atk.y += 90 + 3;
  else if(random === 2) atk.y += 150 + 3;
}
</UTB Code>

============================================================

<UTB Attack 1>
Initial X: 0
Initial Y: this.window.y
Spawn Rate: -1
X Speed: 4
Y Speed: 0
Collision Type: Pixel
Image: Spider-Ani
Animation Frames: 2
Animation Speed: 4
</UTB Attack 1>

name: Phazer Claws
note:
<Use Undertale Attack>

<UTB Duration: 1500>

============================================================

<UTB Attack 1>
Initial X: Graphics.boxWidth
Initial Y: Graphics.boxHeight
Y Speed: 0
Type: Stop
Collision Type: Rect
Width: 48
Height: 48
Spawn Rate: 30
Opacity: 150
Image: Blue-Claw
Rotation: Math.PI * 5
<Initial Code>
this._tYPos = Math.randomInt(window.height) + 30;
</Initial Code>
<Direct Code>
if(frame < 40) {
  this.x -= ((Graphics.boxWidth - this.window.right - this.getWidth())/40);
  this.y -= ((this._tYPos)/20);
  this.rotation -= ((Math.PI * 5)/40)
} else if(frame > 50) {
  if(frame === 51) this.playSe("Wind7");
  this.x -= 6;
}
</Direct Code>
</UTB Attack 1>

name: Ball Throwing
note:
<Use Undertale Attack>

<UTB Duration: 250>
<UTB Mode: 1>

<UTB Code>
if(f === 50) {
  var a = this.createAttack(1);
  a.x = this.window.x;
  a.y = this.window.bottom;
  a.xspeed = 5;
} else if(f === 120) {
  var a = this.createAttack(1);
  a.x = this.window.x;
  a.y = this.window.y;
  a.yspeed = 5;
} else if(f === 190) {
  var a = this.createAttack(1);
  a.x = this.window.right;
  a.y = this.window.y;
  a.yspeed = 5;
}
if(f === 100) {
  p.setMode(1.2);
  p.xspeed = -8;
} else if(f === 150) {
  p.setMode(1.3);
  p.xspeed = 8;
}
</UTB Code>

============================================================

name: Oar Toss
note:
<Use Undertale Attack>

<UTB Mode: 3>
<UTB Duration: 1100>

============================================================

<UTB Attack 1>
Initial X: this.window.x + this.window.width + 50
Initial Y: this.window.y + (this.window.height/2)
Y Speed: 0
Type: Stop
Collision Type: Rect
Width: 48
Height: 250
Spawn Rate: 120
Opacity: 180
Image: Big-Blue-Oar
X Scale: 0
Y Scale: 0
<Direct Code>
if(frame < 90) {
  this.scale.x += (1/90);
  this.scale.y += (1/90);
} else if(frame > 70) {
  if(frame === 71) this.playSe("Miss");
  this.x -= 10;
}
</Direct Code>
</UTB Attack 1>

<UTB Attack 2>
Initial X: this.window.x - 50
Initial Y: 0
Y Speed: 0
Collision Type: Rect
Width: 48
Height: 100
Spawn Rate: 30
X Scale: 0
Y Scale: 0
Image: Oar
<Initial Code>
var random = Math.random();
if(random < 0.3) {
  this.y = window.y + (window.height*(1/4));
} else if(random < 0.6) {
  this.y = window.y + (window.height*(1/2));
} else {
  this.y = window.y + (window.height*(3/4));
}
</Initial Code>
<Direct Code>
if(frame < 60) {
  this.scale.x += (1/60);
  this.scale.y += (1/60);
} else if(frame > 70) {
  if(frame === 71) this.playSe("Miss");
  this.x += 12;
}
</Direct Code>
</UTB Attack 2>

  p.xspeed = -8;
} else if(f === 150) {
  p.setMode(1.4);
  p.xspeed = 8;
}
 else if(f === 220) {
  p.setMode(1.3);
  p.yspeed = -8;
}

</UTB Code>
